reporter-output.line: Setting Environment to: PROD
Environment: PROD
Open url 'http://qa5dev.publisher.nbcuni.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Verify that the search result set column order matches as expected.
Get the text of the first search result set item.
Get the number of results in the result set.
Enter title Automation.
Click the 'Apply' button.
Get the number of results in the result set.
Get the text of the first search result set item.
Click the 'Reset' button.
Get the text of the first search result set item.
Get the number of results in the result set.
Get all the account options in the 'MPX Player Account' select ddl.
Assert that the count of options is expected + 1 for the '-select' option.
Get the text of each of the ddl options.
Assert that each expected account option is present in the 'MPX Player Account' select ddl.
Select the DB TV from the 'MPXPlayerAccount' select ddl.
Click the 'Apply' button.
Get all the MPX result set 'Source' items.
Assert that every source item in the result set equals 'DB TV'.
Click the 'Reset' button.
Select the 'Published' from the 'MPX Player Status' select ddl.
Click the 'Apply' button.
Get all the MPX result set 'Status' items.
Assert that result set size for Published items is greater than 0.
Assert that every status item in the result set equals 'Published'.
Click the 'Reset' button.
Select the 'Unpublished' from the 'MPX Player Status' select ddl.
Click the 'Apply' button.
Get all the MPX result set 'Status' items.
Assert that every status item in the result set equals 'Unpublished'.
Click the 'Reset' button.
Get the text of the first search result set item.
Get the number of results in the result set.
